dcterms:creator: J. Deng
J. Guo
N. Xue
S. Zafeiriou
dcterms:description: The MS1MV2 dataset is used to train deep face recognition models, specifically leveraging the ArcFace loss function to enhance the discriminative power of face recognition systems.
dcterms:title: MS1MV2

dcterms:creator: R. Goh
L. Liu
X. Liu
T. Chen
dcterms:description: The CMU Face in Action (FiA) database contains videos of individuals simulating a passport checking scenario, captured from multiple angles and used to assess adaptive methods in face recognition.
dcterms:title: CMU Face in Action (FiA)

dcterms:creator: Z. Huang
S. Shan
R. Wang
H. Zhang
S. Lao
A. Kuerban
X. Chen
dcterms:description: The COX Face Database is designed for video surveillance, containing videos of individuals captured from different viewpoints, focusing on challenges such as illumination and pose variations.
dcterms:title: COX Face Database
